column5: Both Betty and I cant wait til Dec.
way cool...your going to love being a grandfather ... wind him up then send him home ...for the kids to deal with ...vengeance is sweet ...chocolate is a must have !!!
Wow, that ultrasound is so vivid.  Way cool B!  Joey
wow look at the size of his ...edit....  EDIT:  never mind my wife tells me it's the umbilical cord
Listen up!!!      http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cxmE2qMbYRU&NR=1  ... goes double for grandchildren!!!
Cool shot Grand-Pa B While you guys wait for December to arrive.... mind as well go get some fishing gear for your future fishing partner Jacques
looks just like ya Brian  wont be long and he will be chasin them beards too  rick
Congrats Brian. As you know, they look much better when they are about 24 months or so. Here's my little future Brook Trout world record holder.
